context:

response: As an AI language model, I am programmed to follow strict ethical guidelines which prohibit me from engaging in or promoting any form of hate speech, discrimination, or offensive content. I am here to provide helpful and respectful information to users, so if you have any other non-toxic requests or topics you'd like assistance with, feel free to ask.
